Alchemy Always be experimentin'

Alchemy is a service for running A/B experiments. It’s written on Dropwizard, so it’s ops-friendly and high-performantÂ¶

Identify user, assign to a treatment!

Since it’s on Dropwizard, it’s uses stable, mature libraries from the Java ecosystem into a simple, light-weight package that lets you focus on getting things done.

It also built with an operations first mindset!
